title: Roscoe
description: Roscoe, with his dual personalities and hijinks, stars in the classic television spinoff of the Dark Quiet Death film franchise.
altHero: Roscoe, a pink hairy blob creature with thick eyebrows and a snaggle tooth
alt1: Roscoe strains to pull on some shoes
alt2: Roscoe is delighted with his bunny slippers
alt3: Roscoe looks stunned and in pain
alt4: Roscoe with his foot stuck in a mouse trap has become an anger monster with red eyes and many sharp teeth
